amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the report by the Secretary of the Treasury to include the impact that the threat of default would have on the economy, including, but not limited to, the impact on the Gross Domestic Product (GDP), interest rates, employment, household wealth, and retirement assets.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part A of House Report 114-420 to require the report to include the impact the threat of default would have on the economy, including, but not limited to, the impact on the Gross Domestic Product (GDP), interest rates, employment, household wealth, and retirement assets.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 227 (Roll no. 74).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 227 (Roll no. 74).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Takano.
